snippet: Forward Alexander Radulov, whose departure from Nashville to Russia in 2008 touched off a brief signing war between the N.H.L. and the Russian K.H.L., could be back in time for the N.H.L. playoffs.
abstract: Forward Alexander Radulov, whose departure from Nashville to Russia in 2008 touched off a brief signing war between the N.H.L. and the Russian K.H.L., could be back in time for the N.H.L. playoffs.

headline.main: Radulov, Who Left Predators for Russia, Nears Return
